remarks: The star division ring for the final constructed Hilbert space is a division ring.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhillvec.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhillvec.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhillvec.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhildrng.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hlhilsrng $p |- ( ph -> R e. *Ring ) $.
